mapper.insert:
select site_seq.nextval from dual
insert into site(site_no,site_name,site_park,site_object,site_img,site_introduce,site_homepage,site_open_time,site_close_time,site_phone,site_night_open,site_night_close_time,users_no) values(#{siteNo},#{siteName},#{sitePark},#{siteObject},#{siteImg},#{siteIntroduce},#{siteHomepage},#{siteOpenTime},#{siteCloseTime},#{sitePhone},#{siteNightOpen},#{siteNightCloseTime},#{usersNo})
mapper.update: update site set site_name=#{siteName}, site_img=#{siteImg},site_introduce=#{siteIntroduce},site_homepage=#{siteHomepage} ,site_open_time=#{siteOpenTime},site_close_time=#{siteCloseTime},site_phone=#{sitePhone},site_night_open=#{siteNightOpen},site_night_close_time=#{siteNightCloseTime} where site_no=#{siteNo}
mapper.select: select s.site_no, s.site_name, s.site_park , s.site_object, s.site_img, s.site_introduce, s.site_homepage, s.site_open_time , s.site_close_time, s.site_phone, s.site_night_open, s.site_night_close_time, a.area_name, a.details_address from site s , area a where s.site_no=a.site_no and s.site_name=#{s.site_name}

select s.site_no, s.site_name, s.site_park , s.site_object, s.site_img, s.site_introduce, s.site_homepage, s.site_open_time , s.site_close_time, s.site_phone, s.site_night_open, s.site_night_close_time, a.area_name, a.details_address from site s , area a where s.site_no=a.site_no and s.site_no=#{s.site_no}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a1.* from (select s.site_no ,s.site_name, s.site_park , s.site_object, s.site_img, s.site_introduce, s.site_homepage, s.site_open_time , s.site_close_time, s.site_phone, s.site_night_open, s.site_night_close_time, a.area_name, a.details_address from site s , area a where s.site_no=a.site_no) a1 where rownum<=4) where rnum>=1
